name: Österreichischer Verband Financial Planners
goal: Österreichischer Verband Financial Planners (OVFP) is a not-for-profit organisation. It is also a certifying body for certified financial advisors and financial planners. OVFP represents some 1,400 certified professionals in Austria. All these professionals have undergone extensive education, rigorous exams, are bound to a strict code of ethics and are obliged to meet CPD requirements by far exceeding legal provisions. OVFP is also active in financial education. OVFP is member of Financial Planning Standards Board Europe and of European Financial Planner Association aisbl.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Single market
euInitiatives: EU Action Plan on Sustainable Investments, Proposed Regulations in connection with the action plan.
